body: At 3rd level, when you successfully dispel or counterspell an opponent's spell, the caster (if it is within 100 feet) takes 1d6 points of damage +1 per level of the spell affected. This bloodline power replaces protean resistances.
name: Wild Feedback
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Sorcerer/Sorcerer Archetypes/Wildblooded/Anarchic/Bloodline Powers/Wild Feedback
